Late at night on September 12, Hebei
Parents whose life-saving funds of tens of millions were swindled by the head of the Hebei project of the China Children and Teenagers Charity Foundation were sleeping outside the office building of the Children and Teenagers Charity Foundation.
Every year on the 99 Charity Day, parents of some seriously ill children will borrow money to invest in the 9958 project of the Children and Teenagers Charity Foundation, hoping to get a part of the matching donation to give their children more hope. This year, dozens of sick children were defrauded by Ke Shanxiao, the head of the Hebei project of the Children and Teenagers Charity Foundation, who swindled more than tens of millions of donations and took away the hope of life for these seriously ill children.
So far, no relevant public security organs have accepted the report. The China Children and Teenagers Charity Foundation has not reported the case to the relevant departments.
